name: Silk Duster Coat- Orange
description:
The rich colours of re-cycled silk saris patch worked and hand stitched to create a light jacket beautiful to layer up in Lagenlook ideas.
 Jacket is cut to fit across the shoulders, and flair in a gentle A line, it can be closed with the beaded tassel ties or left open.
Length is just above the knee, sleeves loose and Â¾ length.

Hand stitched by the women of Banseli village and machined the folk of our workshop.
Each piece is ethically produced in our workshop and totally unique in a small way -Irregularities in print, weave, embroidery and colour are inherent characteristics and part of the charm of hand crafted and/or re-cycled textiles.

Dry Clean
SHIPPING IS FREE when ordering directly from our workshop

CODE TOCC 129- Sized to fit
Size 12- Bust:92cm/36in Waist:74cm/29in Hips:98cm/39in
Size 14- Bust:96cm/38in Waist:78cm/31in Hips102cm/41in
Size 16- Bust:100cm/40in Waist:82cm/33in Hips:106cm/43in
Size 18- Bust:104cm/42in Waist:86cm/35in Hips:110cm/45in
You are welcome to request other sizes.

name: Zip Tunic- black
description:
New A line shift dress- zip close up front, 2 pockets in front....comfortable just above knee. Good to layer over pants or be foot loose and fancy free with sandals for summer weather. 
Fabric is Gaffir's hand spun, hand woven cotton...it breattthhhes so well in hot weather 

Each piece is ethically produced in our workshop and totally unique in a small way -Irregularities in print, weave, embroidery and colour are inherent characteristics and part of the charm of hand crafted and/or re-cycled textiles.

Gentle cold wash, dry in shade.

SHIPPING IS FREE when ordering directly from our workshop

name: Tie Dress
description:
Cotton Lycra Dress- stay cool just like this or add a T-shirt underneath- armhole has enough room.
Medium weight Cotton Lycra- discharge and block print were used to create the unique patterns on each piece....all same, same but different.

Styed to be flattering, gently fitted across the bust, shaped but skimming the waist and flaring over the hips. The front tie can be loosely knotted or hang free.

Block print by Mrs Nandu

Each piece is ethically produced in our workshop and totally unique in a small way -Irregularities in print, weave, embroidery and colour are inherent characteristics and part of the charm of hand crafted and/or re-cycled textiles.

Gentle cold wash, dry in shade.

SHIPPING IS FREE when ordering directly from our workshop.

name: Bias Dress
description:
Bias cut dress- handloom silk cotton fabric [warp= cotton, weft= silk].
Styled to gentle fit across bust and flattering flare from there. This version is simple white- elegant as is or a fabulous basis for your own creative colour inspirations. We will offer printed versions in the future.

Length down middle front 104 cm, longer side hem 140 cm. Looks good as a dress or a Lagenlook layer over pants or skirt- the fabric has a great movement to it.
Gentle machine wash.

SHIPPING IS FREE when ordering directly from our workshop.

Machine work by Papu-ji
Each piece fairly made and totally unique in a small way -Irregularities in print, weave, embroidery and colour are inherent characteristics and part of the charm of hand crafted and/or re-cycled textiles

Great over jeans or pants and excellent cover up for the beach as well. Loose shirt style with elbow length loose sleeves. Mid thigh length.

name: Hand weave cotton Tunic
description:
Hand spun, hand woven un-beached cotton tunic with hand stitched details to neck and hem. Flattering length tunic to mid-thigh, styled to be flattering but not tight fitting.  This cloth breathes well, even on the hottest day with its linen-like texture. Handloom cotton is durable farmers cloth that holds its shape and becomes nicer and softer with age; this is a piece that will be loved for years.
Great teamed with jeans or soft pants.

Each piece is ethically produced in our workshop and totally unique in a small way -Irregularities in print, weave, embroidery and colour are inherent characteristics and part of the charm of hand crafted and/or re-cycled textiles.

Gentle cold wash, dry in shade.
